const is_dev_task = () => {
    const task_runner = gulp.env._[0]
    let is_dev = false
    is_dev = (task_runner ==="bar") || (task_runner === "watch")
    return is_dev
}
const is_dev = is_dev_task()
const is_prod = !is_dev

let stream = gulp.src(...)

stream = is_prod
    ? stream.pipe(prod_plugin).pipe(...)
    : stream // nothing

stream = stream.pipe(rest_plugins).pipe(gulp.dest(...))
